mapper.select: select a.id,a.user_name ,a.pass_word,a.account_Status from sys_user a where a.user_name =#{userName}
select a.id,a.user_name ,a.pass_word,a.account_Status from sys_user a where a.user_name =#{id}

SELECT a.id, a.user_name, a.pass_word, a.account_Status, c.id role_id, c.role_name, c.description, e.id menu_id, e.parent_id, e.menu_name, e.icon, e.menu_level, e.sort FROM sys_user AS a INNER JOIN sys_user_role AS b ON b.user_id = a.id INNER JOIN sys_role AS c ON b.role_id = c.id INNER JOIN sys_role_menu AS d ON d.role_id = c.id INNER JOIN sys_menu AS e ON d.menu_id = e.id
a.id =#{id} a.user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')

SELECT a.id, a.user_name, a.pass_word, a.account_Status, c.id role_id, c.role_name, c.description, e.id menu_id, e.parent_id, e.menu_name, e.icon, e.menu_level, e.sort FROM sys_user AS a left JOIN sys_user_role AS b ON b.user_id = a.id left JOIN sys_role AS c ON b.role_id = c.id left JOIN sys_role_menu AS d ON d.role_id = c.id left JOIN sys_menu AS e ON d.menu_id = e.id where a.user_name =#{userName}
